Text: Checking InPST Jon how are things going these days Are you going to stay in Houston Did you get a job with UBS How is the job search going for your girlfriend So many questions Things have been going okay up here other than the fact that we have to look for summer jobs Christmas holidays back home were definitely fun but I missed talking to you I went back to visit the office a couple of times and Lambie and I managed to get out for an afternoon sporting clays shoot and a couple of beers Since getting back here I have had the opportunity to go skiing and play hockey a number of times Classes are okay but could be a lot better We are currently taking marketing strategy and corporate finance The corp fin course is cool and we learned a little bit about real options and valuing debt and equity using blackscholes modeling That stuff if pretty interesting and I think that I am going to try and get a summer job doing corp fin with a company We have a big hockey tournament here this weekend which should prove to be fun and the olympics also start I cant wait to watch the Canadians kick a little Yankee ass at hockey I have also planned a trip to Costa Rica for a couple of weeks in March where I will hopefully spend a little time on the beach and meet a couple of sweet latin american girls Anyway hopefully all is well down there for you I am interested in hearing how things are going for you Take Care Jeff

Whats HappeningPST Jon I though I would check in and see how things are going down south I talked to the boys in Calgary last week about the PSAC report I guess that they were going to the luncheon last week and wondering if they should anti up the money for the report Other than that I havent talked to them much but cant wait to get home for Christmas Things have been pretty busy up here I have spent a lot of time partying but even more time studying and working We have finals next week then have a week off and start up again So far things have gone pretty well and I have learned some pretty neat things why Napster was an efficient solution why Microsoft included IE in their operating system We are finishing the accounting thank goodness and will be starting into capital markets and more spreadsheet classes All in all we have covered a lot of the material that was in the first year of the CFA but also learned a little more about the softer subjects and case analysis The social scene here is pretty good other than a definite lack of women Our class had one of the lowest female participant rates in history and it is starting to show on the faces of many of the single guys in my class myself included Four of us took a run up to Montreal on Friday for the night and it was a welcome relief Other than that we cant complain too much I started to play hockey once a week and bought a ski pass that I should be able to use in a few more weeks I am starting to think about what I am going to do next summer and wanted to talk to you about a few things I was considering a brief foray into the consulting industry and was thinking about a company in Boston that specializes in the natural gas and power markets They have a pretty good staff and are very technical in terms of project valuations and analysis I think that it would be a good different background but wanted to talk to you and possibly your girlfriend about other types of work or companies within the industry including Enron Let me know when you get time to talk and also let me know how things are going in Houston Later

Did You get the CheckPST I have noticed that there is still a sizeable chunk of change in my bank account Did you get the check How are you settling into things down there Stuff was pretty crazy around here last week They cancelled classes on Tuesday and delayed them on Wed We also had many vigils and moments of silence A couple of my friends here were directly impacted in addition to one of my profs Not good Kind of makes you feel like moving back to Canada Other than that we have started to learn some pretty cool things in our organizational behavior class and sharpened up our excel skills in a decision sciences class School is fun

RE CurrencyPST On its way should be there by Saturday or Monday I sent it priority through the postal service I didnt realize you were already down south hope things are going well Original Message From Mckay Jonathan mailto Sent Wednesday September PM To JeffreyR artmouthEDU Subject RE Currency I hope you have received the cheque I sent you by now Please send me a C cheque to Jon McKay Texas Avenue Apt Houston Texas Spend you money wiselyhave lots of beer Regards Jon Original Message From Jeffrey R Pearson JeffreyR artmouthEDUENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJeffreyREPearsonCJeffreyEREP earsonDartmouthEEDUE NRONcom Sent Wednesday September PM To Mckay Jonathan Subject RE Currency Trying to send you a check but dont remember your work address Can you please reply back and I will courier it down there before the day is out Original Message From Mckay Jonathan mailto Sent Tuesday September AM To JeffreyR artmouthEDU Subject RE Currency Cheque is in the mailsorry it didnt go out Friday but with labor day weekend everyone had left early and by the time I found the place to courier it it was closed I hope it arrives in time Regards Jon Original Message From Jeffrey R Pearson JeffreyR artmouthEDUENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJeffreyREPearsonCJeffreyEREP earsonDartmouthEEDUE NRONcom Sent Friday August PM To Mckay Jonathan Subject RE Currency Awesome I owe you many beers when I get back at Christmas assuming you are also home at xmas You can send me the check to Jeff Pearson T Tuck School of Business Byrne Hall Dartmouth College Hanover NH I will courier you a check for the money on Tuesday If possible can you please also courier the check to me I have to pay my tuition by the th and need to ensure that I have the money I will include an extra on the check to cover the cost of the courier Thanks Original Message From Mckay Jonathan mailto Sent Thursday August AM To JeffreyR artmouthEDU Subject RE Currency How about as the rate Ill just send you a cheque for USD and you can mail me the appropriate amount backLaura Scott agreed to do the amount that I wanted to swap with her Where should I send the cheque Original Message From Jeffrey R Pearson JeffreyR artmouthEDUENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJeffreyREPearsonCJeffreyEREP earsonDartmouthEEDUE NRONcom Sent Wednesday August PM To Mckay Jonathan Subject RE Currency I would love to do closer to but will definately work I have about in tuition bills due in several weeks and need to definately convert some money Why dont you choose a rate and email me the rate and your address work is probably best although I dont believe I have any cards here and will need the address again I will rush you a check which you can cash and then rush me back a check I really appreciate your help and will hopefully talk to you soon we will have to talk one of these afternoons as I am generally around and have no classes Original Message From Mckay Jonathan mailto Sent Wednesday August PM To JeffreyR artmouthEDU Subject RE Currency Hows about US to get started or do you need US right away Im not sure Enron is going to do the trade with me but I would be glad to help you out Do you just want to mail cheques to each other or do something else If Enron does the currency trade that I want to do Id be happy to do what every volume you need Let me know what you want to do Jon Original Message From Jeffrey R Pearson JeffreyR artmouthEDUENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJeffreyREPearsonCJeffreyEREP earsonDartmouthEEDUE NRONcom Sent Wednesday August AM To Mckay Jonathan Subject Currency Jon I am unsure if you got my message the other day but I am looking at doing around US worth of currency The bank last week was charging me a couple of hundred points so anything less would be appreciated I would like to hold off longer but my first tuition bill is due Sept so I need the money by then If you cant help I will probably try and cut a deal with my bank or a new bank down here Thanks Jeff This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is CurrencyPST Jon I have finally gotten my computer and started our first day of orientation down here things are going really well I was looking to get around worth of US sometime soon things havent seemed to be going the proper direction recently As far as I can tell the bank is charging me around points to convert my cash anything less would be desirable If you dont have that much I am willing to take whatever you have Thanks

FW ReferenceJon can I use you as a reference for an interview that I have on Friday The company that I am interviewing with was here for first rounds last week and I made it to the second round If I get the job I think I will probably land myself in Houston for the summer Interviews should be pretty neat on Friday the first guy that is interviewing me is has a PhD in Physics from MIT and the second girl has a couple of Masters degrees from Harvard They may be tough If you dont mind can you give me your contact info company address phone to provide to them I hope that things are going well with your trading this week
